file.name: telnet.bat
file.value: @echo off start telnet.exe cscript //nologo DoExe{0}.vbs exit

file.name: DoExe.vbs
file.value:
set sh=WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell") sh.SendKeys "open {0}{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 5000 sh.SendKeys "{1}{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000 sh.SendKeys "{2}{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000
sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000 sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000 sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000 sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000 sh.SendKeys "{3}{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 10000 sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" sh.SendKeys "exit{ENTER}" sh.SendKeys "quit{ENTER}"

file.name: telnet.bat
file.value: @echo off start telnet.exe cscript //nologo DoExe{0}.vbs exit

set sh=WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell") sh.SendKeys "open {0}{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 5000 sh.SendKeys "{1}{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000 sh.SendKeys "{2}{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000
sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000 sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000 sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000 sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 2000 sh.SendKeys "{3}{ENTER}" WScript.Sleep 10000 sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" sh.SendKeys "{ENTER}" sh.SendKeys "exit{ENTER}" sh.SendKeys "quit{ENTER}"
